MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Energy processing | c: Cellular organization | d: Homeostasis

MCQ: What is the main unit of life that processes hereditary information?
Choices: a: Atoms | b: Molecules | c: Cells | d: Tissues

MCQ: Which level of organization in biology studies the anatomy and physiology of plants and animals?
Choices: a: Molecular biology | b: Ecology | c: Organismal biology | d: Population biology

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 2.5 billion years ago | b: 4.2 billion years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 5.0 billion years ago
